text: Va munofiqon onhoro (ja'ne, mu'minonro) nido dihand, ki ojo mo dar dunjo ʙo sumo hamroh naʙudem va misli sumo iʙodat mekardem? Mu'minon ʙarojason megujand: «Bale, ammo sumo xudro ʙa nifoqu ma'sijat dar ʙalo afkanded va ʙa margi pajomʙar va noʙudii musalmonon intizori karded va ʙa ruzi az nav zinda sudani ʙa'di murdan dar sak ʙuded va orzuhoi dunjo sumoro ʙifireft, to on goh ki farmoni Alloh (acal) darrasid va fireʙgarii sajton dar farmonʙardori ʙa Alloh fireʙaton dod
